ygData.subject: RE: Bard Handicap of Sorts
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Slyde, Another thing about where you lost your corpse (if its the place I m thinking about), that tunnel is one way.  There are exactly two ways out, fire
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
>
> I never said I had any problems with "taking responsibility to
> get my corpse
> back"

Slyde,

Another thing about where you lost your corpse (if its the place I'm
thinking about), that tunnel is one way. There are exactly two ways out,
fire shield yourself as much as you can, swim in, get your stuff, zone to
sol B and hope you can make it out of the lava there before you die or
levitate, get your stuff and gate.

Neither of these options is very good. IMO, its a bug in the software
that its one way (at least that's what a GM told a friend of mine who got
stuck there) but he didn't get any help either. It was worse for him though
because he's a troll. Without the guise of deceiver or a shaman around he
can't even FIT in that area.

The fact that you reaquired your stuff speaks highly of you!

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 44 Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
